rules: Rule1: Under the condition that the employee has a desk, the employee sits at a workstation.
Rule2: Either the employee has a desk or the employee works remotely.
Rule3: The employee works on a project or the employee works overtime.
Rule4: Under the condition that the employee works overtime, it is not the case that the employee drinks coffee.
Rule5: If the employee completes a task, the employee attends a meeting.
Rule6: Provided that the employee meets the deadline for the project, the employee completes a task.

Rule7: Whenever the manager approves of the employee, then if it is not the case that the employee works on a project implies the employee meets the deadline for the project, the employee gets a bonus.
Rule8: If the employee has a monitor, then the employee uses a computer.
Rule9: If the employee is promoted, it is not the case that the employee is fired.
Rule10: The employee drinks coffee or, if the employee sits at a workstation, the employee has a monitor.
Rule11: Under the condition that it is not the case that the employee works on a project implies the employee meets the deadline for the project, it is not the case that the employee gets a bonus.
Rule12: If it is not the case that the employee is employed by the company implies that if the employee sits at a workstation, the employee has a monitor, then the employee is fired.
facts: Fact1: The manager approves of the employee.
Fact2: The employee is employed by the company.
Fact4: The employee does not use a computer.
Fact5: It is not the case that the employee attends a meeting.
